title: Camtasia 2
description:
Hello friends today I bring camtasia studio full ready to use.

Camtasia 2
TechSmith Corporation
Open Mac App Store to buy and download apps.
Description
Camtasia provides all the tools you need to easily create compelling video and high quality. Whether you want to put together a training video, a presentation or a flashy demo video, Camtasia facilitates communication of your message visually adds professional sheen and captures screen activity.

* Capture what you are seeing and doing *
Run the application, website or web Keynote presentation that you want to appear on your screen display video and screen recorder captures everything that happens on the screen.

* Decree Creating videos with a professional touch *
Camtasia makes it look like a professional video, even if it is not. Quickly and easily, highlight their movements, create interactive content captivates his audience like never before. Simply drag and drop annotations, transitions, light bulbs and more directly on your video.

* Communicate Your Message Visually *
Share high-quality HD video so viewers can watch anytime on almost any device. The Player, Smart Player TechSmith, TechSmith intelligent viewers allows visual access content anywhere, even from browsers browsers or devices that are not Flash. And use Camtasia files on the host site free hosting TechSmith, Screencast.com, upload, manage, view and share your HD quality videos. You can also share your videos on YouTube, Apple devices, Webweb your site, blog and more.

Technical Note ** **
There are a number of third-party QuickTime components that can be installed on the computer that currently do not support an application running in a sandbox environment aislamientoel. If present, these components can be lead to instability or failure of the software application. At this point, we recommend upgrading these components to the latest version available from the vendor of the component to avoid conflicts with Camtasia.

For more information, refer to this article: http://techsmith.custhelp.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/3594 (in English).
